document.title: asia: china: democratic reforms risk plunge into ?abyss,? leader says
lines_and_colors: the leader of china?s quasi-legislature said that china would never embrace western political tenets because loosening the communist party?s hold on power risked plunging the nation into ?the abyss of internal disorder.?
